notes: Erection of a first and second floor rear extension including internal alterations to facilitate the conversion of the existing 4 flats into a total of 6 flats (2 x 1bed and 4 x studio)
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

notes: Conversion of property into 6 self-contained flats (3 x studios, 1 x 1bed, 1 x 2bed and 1 x 3bed) involving the partial demolition and extension of the existing building to include excavation of a basement level with front and rear lightwell, part one and part two storey rear extension, juliet balconies to the ground floor rear elevation, alterations to the roof and main entrance, and associated car and cycle parking spaces, bin stores, landscaping and amenity space.

Hip to gable roof extension to the main roof, roof extension with associated dormer to the rear of main roof, 2nd floor rear extension, rear 1st floor link extension to the rear building and conversion of the upper floors into 5 self-contained flats (1 x Studio, 3 x 1 Bed and 1 x 2 Bed), and retention of the ground floor commercial units to include a new front entrance and conversion of the storage area on the basement floor into offices.
